concept.title: Appendix A: Upgrading Eucalyptus
concept.shortdesc: This section details the tasks you need to perform in order to upgrade your current version of Eucalyptus.

conbody.p: You can upgrade to Eucalyptus from . To upgrade from any other version of Eucalyptus, you should first upgrade to either . Follow the directions in the previous Installation Guide, and then upgrade to using these directions.
conbody.note: Eucalyptus does not support components that are at different releases, even at the sub-minor level. For example, you cannot have a CLC at 3.3.1 and a Walrus at 3.3.0. Please make sure that you update all Eucalyptus components when you upgrade.
